entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Grande-Quatre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -22.8°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 35. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
